item.title: Short-Form Humor/Comedy Video Creator for Educational Brand - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented, creative, and hilarious individual to produce short-form videos (Instagram Reels / YouTube Shorts / TikToks) for our educational brand. The ideal candidate will have a strong pulse of current social trends and the ability to leverage them to create engaging and on-brand content for Fusion Academy. As a video creator, you will be responsible for brainstorming ideas, scripting, filming, and editing high-quality videos that align with our brand's objectives. This role requires excellent communication skills, attention to detail, and a passion for education. If you have a knack for storytelling and the ability to make complex topics accessible and entertaining, we want to hear from you!

Brand: Fusion Academy
IG: https://www.instagram.com/fusion_academy/

Skills required:
- Video production and editing
- Scriptwriting
- Knowledge of social media platforms
- Creativity and innovation
- Attention to detail

Size: Medium
Duration: 1 to 3 months
Expertise: Intermediate


Posted On: June 30, 2024 00:24 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Education
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Education
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
